page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: I attend the Junior School in Recreation Ground Rd., Tenterden. The Infants School is next door. I went there until last year when I was 7. The head mistress there is Mrs.Harper. Our new headmaster is Mr.Weaver. Recently we have changed the times when we come to school and go home. We start school at 8.55am and work until 12.00. We have a mid-morning playtime at 10.35am for about quarter of an hour.Most children stay at school for lunch.I have school dinners at 60p each day, some have sandwiches. We start school again at 1.10pm and we work through the afternoon until we go home at 3.10pm. We go a little earlier so that it is not such a squash in the cloakroom. We do mostly Mathematics and English in the morning and usually Science, Geography or Art after lunch. I shall go to Homewood School at 11.
